column2: so this place made me fall in love with BBQ. I was so hesitant to go because I am not a BBQ fan (Weird
column4: but I dont usually like the stickiness of it). I got the beef and it was incredible. It has been 5 long months since I have been here and can hardly wait to go back. Beware that on a weekend there will probably be a line
column5: we waited probably 15-20 minutes but it was definitely worth it. The BBQ sauce they use is out of this world
column6: I even took the small amount I had left home so my family could try it!
